```{r}
# one function that serializes the data
# take column and variables you want to check for
dummyColumn <- list("a", "b", "c")

serial <- function(item) {
    if(item == "a") {
     return(0)
   }
   else if(item == "b") {
     return(1)
   }
   else if(item == "c") {
     return(2)
   }
    
}

# run serial for each item in column and print list with new values
score <- function(column) {
  scoreCol <- map(column, serial)
print(scoreCol)
}

score(dummyColumn)

#second function that sums values for each state
```
